Rares at the saucer shop!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q & A: Rares at the saucer shop!
By Morigale on Friday, April 14, 2006 - 12:02 am:

I haven't been checking the saucer shop much, so it was pure luck that I decided to try and get some new monsters when I did.
The saucer shop in the second town, the three-level factory thing, had a PieRipper!
I've been told those come from the Pirates of the Caribbean DVD, and it is definitely a ??? subtype.

I'm not sure how I could prove it - I still have the saucer, although I had him engrave it as 'Lucky', and could take a picture of the saucer section, but I didn't think to get a picture of the shop with the saucer in it.

By VenomousX on Friday, April 14, 2006 - 11:05 am:

Yeah I see rares at the shop from time to time... apparently certain "rares" are a little less difficult to get.

By Darthgali on Saturday, April 15, 2006 - 01:53 pm:

Not only can you get disks in the shop, I've gotten "Book Cards" from killing enemies. Gotten 4 so far, 2 of which were new monsters for me!!!

This game is much more friendly to the ranchers with few discs....

By fiffa46 on Sunday, April 16, 2006 - 09:39 am:

So far I got the Book Card for Pancho/Jell and Golem/Golem. I had already shrined a Pancho/Jell but not a Golem/Golem so I was happy to get one. :D

By Kit_Wanderer on Sunday, April 16, 2006 - 05:56 pm:

What are the Book Cards for? I've gotten 4 or 5 of them now. And where are they in my inventory?

By fiffa46 on Sunday, April 16, 2006 - 06:03 pm:

your book, where all the monster you shrine go so you don't have to keep re-shrining the same cd over and over. Its just a page for that book. So, now you might be able to get monster you couldn't get before.

By Trickster on Sunday, April 16, 2006 - 06:29 pm:

Check under "Data" then "Book" in your menu to see what all you've unlocked (from Book Cards, shrining, etc.)
